item.name: Abyssal Specter
item.text: Flying Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
item.flavorText: "Open the gates, and bid them enter." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.name: Adarkar Sentinel
item.text: {1}: Adarkar Sentinel gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "We encountered the Sentinels in the wastes, near no living thing. Their purpose was inscrutable." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Adarkar Unicorn
item.text: {T}: Add either {U} or {1}{U} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to pay cumulative upkeep costs.
item.flavorText: "There is no nobler creature in all of Terisiare." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

item.name: Adarkar Wastes
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. Adarkar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Aegis of the Meek
item.text: {1}, {T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "With this marvel, even the weak have a fighting chance" —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Aggression
item.text: Enchant non-Wall creature Enchanted creature has first strike and trample. At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, destroy that creature if it didn't attack this turn.
item.flavorText: The star that burns twice as bright burns half as long.

item.name: Altar of Bone
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Altar of Bone, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Amulet of Quoz
item.text: Remove Amulet of Quoz from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. {T}, Sacrifice Amulet of Quoz: Target opponent may add the top card of his or her library to the ante. If he or she doesn't, you flip a coin. If you win the flip, that player loses the game. If you lose the flip, you lose the game. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

item.name: Anarchy
item.text: Destroy all white permanents.
item.flavorText: "The Shaman waved the staff, and the land itself went mad." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Arctic Foxes
item.text: Creatures with power 2 or greater can't block Arctic Foxes as long as defending player controls a snow land.
item.flavorText: "Those Foxes are wily, swift, and ferocious. They are the warriors of the snows." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

item.name: Arcum's Sleigh
item.text: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains vigilance until end of turn. Activate this ability only during combat and only if defending player controls a snow land.
item.flavorText: "With the proper equipment and caution, one can travel anywhere." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Arcum's Weathervane
item.text: {2}, {T}: Target snow land is no longer snow. {2}, {T}: Target nonsnow basic land becomes snow.

item.name: Arcum's Whistle
item.text: {3}, {T}: Choose target non-Wall creature the active player has controlled continuously since the beginning of the turn. That player may pay {X}, where X is that creature's converted mana cost. If he or she doesn't, the creature attacks this turn if able, and at the beginning of the next end step, destroy it if it didn't attack. Activate this ability only before attackers are declared.

item.name: Arenson's Aura
item.text:
{W}, Sacrifice an enchantment: Destroy target enchantment.
{3}{U}{U}: Counter target enchantment spell.
item.flavorText: "I have my faith, and I have my prayers. But if push comes to shove, I've also got a little something extra." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.name: Armor of Faith
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. {W}: Enchanted creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Keep your chainmail, warrior. I have my own form of protection." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.name: Arnjlot's Ascent
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) {1}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The dreams of a child fulfilled: The wind on my brow, the air 'neath my feet." —Arnjlot Olasson, Sky Mage

item.name: Ashen Ghoul
item.text: Haste {B}: Return Ashen Ghoul from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only if three or more creature cards are above Ashen Ghoul.

item.name: Aurochs
item.text: Trample Whenever Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.
item.flavorText: One Auroch may feed a village, but a herd will flatten it.

item.name: Avalanche
item.text: Destroy X target snow lands.
item.flavorText: "The pass was completely blocked by the avalanche; we're forced to turn back. Nevertheless, we've gone farther and seen more than any before us." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Balduvian Barbarians
item.flavorText: "Barbarian raids were a concern to those living in the northwest provinces, but the Skyknights never dealt with the problem in a systematic way. They thought of the Balduvians as an ‘amusing model' of their forebears' culture." —Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

item.name: Balduvian Bears
item.flavorText: "They're a hardy bunch, but I'd still bet that they just slept through the worst of the cold times." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Balduvian Conjurer
item.text: {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
item.flavorText: "The very lands of Balduvia are alive." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

item.name: Balduvian Hydra
item.text: Balduvian Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+0 counters on it. Remove a +1/+0 counter from Balduvian Hydra: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Balduvian Hydra this turn. {R}{R}{R}: Put a +1/+0 counter on Balduvian Hydra. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

item.name: Balduvian Shaman
item.text: {T}: Change the text of target white enchantment you control that doesn't have cumulative upkeep by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (For example, you may change "counters black spells" to "counters blue spells.") That enchantment gains "Cumulative upkeep {1}." (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless he or she pays its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

item.name: Barbarian Guides
item.text: {2}{R}, {T}: Choose a land type. Target creature you control gains snow landwalk of the chosen type until end of turn. Return that creature to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

item.name: Barbed Sextant
item.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbed Sextant: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

item.name: Baton of Morale
item.text: {2}: Target creature gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
item.flavorText: "The Goblins would kill to get ahold of this one." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Battle Cry
item.text:
Untap all white creatures you control.
Whenever a creature blocks this turn, it gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "In the thick of battle, you must keep your wits about you. Yelling a lot helps, too." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

item.name: Battle Frenzy
item.text:
Green creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Nongreen creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "One day you, too, shall drink the blood of your foes. It is something to look forward to." —Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

item.name: Binding Grasp
item.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Binding Grasp unless you pay {1}{U}. You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +0/+1.
item.flavorText: "What I want, I take." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

item.name: Black Scarab
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by black creatures. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a black permanent.

item.name: Blessed Wine
item.text: You gain 1 life. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "May the bounty of Kjeld enrich your days." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.name: Blinking Spirit
item.text: {0}: Return Blinking Spirit to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "Don't look at it Maybe it'll go away" —Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician

item.name: Blizzard
item.text: Cast Blizzard only if you control a snow land. Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Creatures with flying don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

item.name: Blue Scarab
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by blue creatures. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a blue permanent.

item.name: Bone Shaman
item.text: {B}: Until end of turn, Bone Shaman gains "Creatures dealt damage by Bone Shaman this turn can't be regenerated this turn."
item.flavorText: Rattle me bones as I cross the floor And the bones in your grave will rattle no more.

item.name: Brainstorm
item.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
item.flavorText: "I reeled from the blow, and then suddenly, I knew exactly what to do. Within moments, victory was mine." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

item.name: Brand of Ill Omen
item.text: Enchant creature Cumulative upkeep {R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Enchanted creature's controller can't cast creature spells.
item.flavorText: "Let those who bear the brand receive no shelter, no kindness, and no comfort from our people." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.name: Breath of Dreams
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Green creatures have "Cumulative upkeep {1}."
item.flavorText: "Get up, blast you They're attacking Why are you all so slow?" —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

item.name: Brine Shaman
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. {1}{U}{U}, Sacrifice a creature: Counter target creature spell.
item.flavorText: "The Shamans of Marit Lage do her bidding in secret, but they do it gladly." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.name: Brown Ouphe
item.text: {1}{G}, {T}: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
item.flavorText: "Ouphes love trinkets and love to take them apart. I only wish they wouldn't do so with the magical ones." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

item.name: Brushland
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Brushland deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Burnt Offering
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Burnt Offering, sacrifice a creature. Add X mana in any combination of {B} and/or {R} to your mana pool, where X is the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost.
item.flavorText: "My foes serve me twice: in dying, and in death." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.name: Call to Arms
item.text: As Call to Arms enters the battlefield, choose a color and an opponent. White creatures get +1/+1 as long as the chosen color is the most common color among nontoken permanents the chosen player controls but isn't tied for most common. When the chosen color isn't the most common color among nontoken permanents the chosen player controls or is tied for most common, sacrifice Call to Arms.

item.name: Caribou Range
item.text: Enchant land you control Enchanted land has "{W}{W}, {T}: Put a 0/1 white Caribou creature token onto the battlefield." Sacrifice a Caribou token: You gain 1 life.

item.name: Celestial Sword
item.text: {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Destroy it at the beginning of the next end step. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "So great is its power, only the chosen can wield it and live." —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

item.name: Centaur Archer
item.text: {T}: Centaur Archer deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
item.flavorText: "Centaurs will kill our Aesthir if they can; they've always been enemies. Destroy the horse-people on sight." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

item.name: Chaos Lord
item.text: First strike, haste At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if the number of permanents is even, that player gains control of Chaos Lord. When Chaos Lord enters the battlefield, it loses haste until end of turn.

item.name: Chaos Moon
item.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, count the number of permanents. If the number is odd, until end of turn, red creatures get +1/+1 and whenever a player taps a Mountain for mana, that player adds {R} to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces). If the number is even, until end of turn, red creatures get -1/-1 and if a player taps a Mountain for mana, that Mountain produces colorless mana instead of any other type.

item.name: Chromatic Armor
item.text: Enchant creature As Chromatic Armor enters the battlefield, choose a color. Chromatic Armor enters the battlefield with a sleight counter on it. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature by a source of the last chosen color. {X}: Put a sleight counter on Chromatic Armor and choose a color. X is the number of sleight counters on Chromatic Armor.

item.name: Chub Toad
item.text: Whenever Chub Toad blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Chub Toad, Chub Toad At the door. Run away quick Or you'll run no more. —Traditional children's rhyme

item.name: Circle of Protection: Black
item.text: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

item.name: Circle of Protection: Blue
item.text: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

item.name: Circle of Protection: Green
item.text: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

item.name: Circle of Protection: Red
item.text: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

item.name: Circle of Protection: White
item.text: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

item.name: Clairvoyance
item.text:
Look at target player's hand.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "As we followed the ice wall, we had the distinct feeling of being watched. Many of the party wanted to turn back." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Cloak of Confusion
item.text: Enchant creature you control Whenever enchanted creature attacks and isn't blocked, you may have it assign no combat damage this turn. If you do, defending player discards a card at random.

item.name: Cold Snap
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Cold Snap deals damage to that player equal to the number of snow lands he or she controls.
item.flavorText: Who knows from whence the winter comes?

item.name: Conquer
item.text: Enchant land You control enchanted land.
item.flavorText: "Why do we trade with those despicable Elves? You don't live in forests, you burn them" —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

item.name: Cooperation
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
item.flavorText: "The Elves train our healers, and we keep the Orcs at bay. Most Elvish bargains aren't as fair." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

item.name: Counterspell
item.text: Counter target spell.
item.flavorText: "The duel was going badly for me, and Zur thought I was finished. He boasted that he would eat my soul—but all he ate were his words." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

item.name: Crown of the Ages
item.text: {4}, {T}: Attach target Aura attached to a creature to another creature.

item.name: Curse of Marit Lage
item.text: When Curse of Marit Lage enters the battlefield, tap all Islands. Islands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
item.flavorText: "Our world has not felt her thundering steps in lifetimes, but Marit Lage's presence is still with us." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.name: Dance of the Dead
item.text: Enchant creature card in a graveyard When Dance of the Dead enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Dance of the Dead." Return enchanted creature card to the battlefield tapped under your control and attach Dance of the Dead to it. When Dance of the Dead leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {1}{B}. If he or she does, untap that creature.

item.name: Dark Banishing
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "Will not the mountains quake and hills melt at the coming of the darkness? Share this vision with your enemies, Lim-Dûl, and they shall wither." —Leshrac, Walker of Night

item.name: Dark Ritual
item.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Leshrac, my liege, grant me the power I am due." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.name: Death Ward
item.text: Regenerate target creature.
item.flavorText: "Sometimes, a soul is not ready to complete its journey to the next world." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.name: Deflection
item.text: Change the target of target spell with a single target.
item.flavorText: Up and down, over and through, back around— the joke's on you.

item.name: Demonic Consultation
item.text: Name a card. Exile the top six cards of your library, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal the named card. Put that card into your hand and exile all other cards revealed this way.

item.name: Despotic Scepter
item.text: {T}: Destroy target permanent you own. It can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "We were not meant to have such terrible things. They should be left where we found them, if not destroyed" —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

item.name: Diabolic Vision
item.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on top of your library in any order.
item.flavorText: "I have seen the true path. I will not warm myself by the fire—I will become the flame." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.name: Dire Wolves
item.text: Dire Wolves has banding as long as you control a Plains. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
item.flavorText: "It's amazing how scared a city kid can get at a dog. Now, of course, I'd cross Terisiare alone, and keep no watch if I had a pack of greys hanging on my flanks as I went." —Oddveig Ulfsson, caravan scout

item.name: Disenchant
item.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
item.flavorText: "I implore you not to forget the horrors of the past. You would have us start the Brothers' War anew" —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

item.name: Dread Wight
item.text: At end of combat, put a paralyzation counter on all creatures blocking or blocked by Dread Wight and tap those creatures. They gain "If this creature has a paralyzation counter on it, it doesn't untap during its controller's untap step" and "{4}: Remove a paralyzation counter from this creature."

item.name: Dreams of the Dead
item.text: {1}{U}: Return target white or black creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains "Cumulative upkeep {2}." If the creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else. (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless he or she pays its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

item.name: Drift of the Dead
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Drift of the Dead's power and toughness are each equal to the number of snow lands you control.
item.flavorText: "Take their dead, and entomb them in the snow. Risen, they shall serve a new purpose." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.name: Drought
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Drought unless you pay {W}{W}. Spells cost an additional "Sacrifice a Swamp" to cast for each black mana symbol in their mana costs. Activated abilities cost an additional "Sacrifice a Swamp" to activate for each black mana symbol in their activation costs.

item.name: Dwarven Armory
item.text: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +2/+2 counter on target creature. Activate this ability only during any upkeep step.
item.flavorText: "Few of us left, now. Confounded Yeti have opened all the vents. We'd best hide here with the weapons." —Perena Deepcutter, Dwarven Armorer

item.name: Earthlink
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Earthlink unless you pay {2}. Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices a land.

item.name: Earthlore
item.text: Enchant land you control Enchanted land has "{T}: Target blocking creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn."
item.flavorText: "Even the ground is our friend." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

item.name: Elder Druid
item.text: {3}{G}, {T}: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
item.flavorText: "I am older than any Elder Druid before me, and still no child has been born with the Mark to take my place. When will the wheel turn?" —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

item.name: Elemental Augury
item.text: {3}: Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order.
item.flavorText: "It is the changing of perception that is important." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

item.name: Elkin Bottle
item.text: {3}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card.

item.name: Elvish Healer
item.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. If that creature is green, prevent the next 2 damage instead.
item.flavorText: "The Kjeldorans keep the Orcs at bay and we train their healers. Most human bargains aren't as fair." —Laina of the Elvish Council

item.name: Enduring Renewal
item.text: Play with your hand revealed. If you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, draw a card. Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.
item.flavorText: That which lasts longest serves best.

item.name: Energy Storm
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Prevent all damage that would be dealt by instant and sorcery spells. Creatures with flying don't untap during their controller's untap step.

item.name: Enervate
item.text:
Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "Worlds turn in crucial moments of decision. Make your choice." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

item.name: Errant Minion
item.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay any amount of mana. Errant Minion deals 2 damage to that player. Prevent X of that damage, where X is the amount of mana that player paid this way.
item.flavorText: Abandon not your faith when others abandon you.

item.name: Errantry
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and can only attack alone.
item.flavorText: "There is no shame in solitude. The lone Knight may succeed where a hundred founder." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

item.name: Essence Filter
item.text: Destroy all enchantments or all nonwhite enchantments.
item.flavorText: "Freyalise has cleansed our bodies and minds of the plagues of Kjeldor; all she asks in return is that we keep pure our newly given home in Fyndhorn." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

item.name: Essence Flare
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -0/-1 counter on that creature.
item.flavorText: Never underestimate the power of the soul unleashed.

item.name: Essence Vortex
item.text: Destroy target creature unless its controller pays life equal to its toughness. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: Masters who sacrifice for servants will receive the gift of loyalty.

item.name: Fanatical Fever
item.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Let go your fury, and hone your anger. Become the fist of Freyalise" —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

item.name: Fear
item.text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
item.flavorText: "Even the bravest of warriors yet knows the dark clutch of fright upon his stalwart heart." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.name: Fiery Justice
item.text: Fiery Justice deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. Target opponent gains 5 life.
item.flavorText: "The fire of justice burns like nothing else."Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.name: Fire Covenant
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Fire Covenant, pay X life. Fire Covenant deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

item.name: Flame Spirit
item.text: {R}: Flame Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The spirit of the flame is the spirit of change." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.name: Flare
item.text:
Flare deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "I strive for elegance and speed in my work." —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

item.name: Flooded Woodlands
item.text: Green creatures can't attack unless their controller sacrifices a land for each green creature he or she controls that's attacking.
item.flavorText: Freyalise's tears bring life and renewal, though they also bring trouble.

item.name: Flow of Maggots
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Flow of Maggots can't be blocked by non-Wall creatures.
item.flavorText: "The very earth seemed alive and made a sound like the writhing of the damned." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

item.name: Folk of the Pines
item.text: {1}{G}: Folk of the Pines gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Our friends of the forest take many forms, yet all serve the will of Freyalise." —Laina of the Elvish Council

item.name: Forbidden Lore
item.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn."

item.name: Force Void
item.text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "My mind and spirit are one—a barrier not readily passed." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forgotten Lore
item.text: Target opponent chooses a card in your graveyard. You may pay {G}. If you do, repeat this process except that opponent can't choose a card already chosen for Forgotten Lore. Then put the last chosen card into your hand.
item.flavorText: In ashes are the gems of history.

item.name: Formation
item.text: Target creature gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.) Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "I have been a warrior for over four hundred years, and yet each generation of Kjeldorans teaches me new tricks. There can be no better allies." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

item.name: Foul Familiar
item.text: Foul Familiar can't block. {B}, Pay 1 life: Return Foul Familiar to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "Serve me, and live forever." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.name: Foxfire
item.text: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "Only the foolish fear Foxfire." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

item.name: Freyalise Supplicant
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice a red or white creature: Freyalise Supplicant deals damage to target creature or player equal to half the sacrificed creature's power, rounded down.
item.flavorText: "We have joined with the Druids of the Juniper Order. Our faith is one." —Laina of the Elvish Council

item.name: Freyalise's Charm
item.text: Whenever an opponent casts a black spell, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, you draw a card. {G}{G}: Return Freyalise's Charm to its owner's hand.

item.name: Freyalise's Winds
item.text: Whenever a permanent becomes tapped, put a wind counter on it. If a permanent with a wind counter on it would untap during its controller's untap step, remove all wind counters from it instead.

item.name: Fumarole
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Fumarole, pay 3 life. Destroy target creature and target land.
item.flavorText: "Too many of us have died in the explosions that wrack these hills." —Klazina Jansdotter, Leader of the Order of the Sacred Torch

item.name: Fylgja
item.text: Enchant creature Fylgja enters the battlefield with four healing counters on it. Remove a healing counter from Fylgja: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature this turn. {2}{W}: Put a healing counter on Fylgja.

item.name: Fyndhorn Bow
item.text: {3}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "With a bow like this, the hunting is always good." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

item.name: Fyndhorn Brownie
item.text: {2}{G}, {T}: Untap target creature.
item.flavorText: "I've been insulted by drunks in a hundred inns, but never as skillfully or annoyingly as by those blasted Brownies." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

item.name: Fyndhorn Elder
item.text: {T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Do we know what we're doing? Yes—the will of Freyalise." —Laina of the Elvish Council

item.name: Fyndhorn Elves
item.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
item.flavorText: "Living side by side with the Elves for so long leaves me with no doubt that we serve the same goddess." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

item.name: Fyndhorn Pollen
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) All creatures get -1/-0. {1}{G}: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "I breathed deeply, and suddenly I knew not who or where I was." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

item.name: Game of Chaos
item.text: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 1 life and target opponent loses 1 life, and you decide whether to flip again. If you lose the flip, you lose 1 life and that opponent gains 1 life, and that player decides whether to flip again. Double the life stakes with each flip.

item.name: Gangrenous Zombies
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice Gangrenous Zombies: Gangrenous Zombies deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. If you control a snow Swamp, Gangrenous Zombies deals 2 damage to each creature and each player instead.

item.name: Gaze of Pain
item.text: Until end of turn, whenever a creature you control attacks and isn't blocked, you may choose to have it deal damage equal to its power to a target creature. If you do, it assigns no combat damage this turn.
item.flavorText: Remove the guardians to ensure your victory.

item.name: General Jarkeld
item.text: {T}: Switch the blocking creatures of two target attacking creatures. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step.

item.name: Ghostly Flame
item.text: Black and/or red permanents and spells are colorless sources of damage.
item.flavorText: "Walk slowly when in the nether world, and seek that which calls." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.name: Giant Growth
item.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Here in Fyndhorn, the goddess Freyalise is generous to her children." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

item.name: Giant Trap Door Spider
item.text: {1}{R}{G}, {T}: Exile Giant Trap Door Spider and target creature without flying that's attacking you.
item.flavorText: "So large and so quiet—a combination best avoided." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Glacial Chasm
item.text: Cumulative upkeep—Pay 2 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Glacial Chasm enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land. Creatures you control can't attack. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

item.name: Glacial Crevasses
item.text: Sacrifice a snow Mountain: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
item.flavorText: "We were chasing Lim-Dûl when the ridge in front of us suddenly crumbled. I can't believe it was mere coincidence." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

item.name: Glacial Wall
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
item.flavorText: "We are farther west than any could have imagined possible, but I still wish to press on. Unfortunately, huge walls of ice block further travel. We can't believe they are natural." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Glaciers
item.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Glaciers unless you pay {W}{U}.
All Mountains are Plains.
item.flavorText: "Even the highest mountain can be ground to dust." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

item.name: Goblin Lyre
item.text: Sacrifice Goblin Lyre: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, Goblin Lyre deals damage to target opponent equal to the number of creatures you control. If you lose the flip, Goblin Lyre deals damage to you equal to the number of creatures that opponent controls.

item.name: Goblin Mutant
item.text: Trample Goblin Mutant can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater. Goblin Mutant can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.
item.flavorText: If only it had three brains, too.

item.name: Goblin Sappers
item.text: {R}{R}, {T}: Target creature you control is unblockable this turn. Destroy it and Goblin Sappers at end of combat. {R}{R}{R}{R}, {T}: Target creature you control is unblockable this turn. Destroy it at end of combat.

item.name: Goblin Ski Patrol
item.text: {1}{R}: Goblin Ski Patrol gets +2/+0 and gains flying. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only once and only if you control a snow Mountain.
item.flavorText: "AIIIEEEE" —Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician

item.name: Goblin Snowman
item.text: Whenever Goblin Snowman blocks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by it this turn. {T}: Goblin Snowman deals 1 damage to target creature it's blocking.
item.flavorText: "Strength in numbers? Right." —Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician

item.name: Gorilla Pack
item.text:
Gorilla Pack can't attack unless defending player controls a Forest.
When you control no Forests, sacrifice Gorilla Pack.
item.flavorText: "We learned this at a dear price: once you cross the great river, get through the Yavimaya forest at top speed." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Gravebind
item.text:
Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: One foot in the grave, firmly planted.

item.name: Green Scarab
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by green creatures. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a green permanent.

item.name: Grizzled Wolverine
item.text: Whenever Grizzled Wolverine becomes blocked, you may pay {R}. If you do, Grizzled Wolverine gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Before you release a Woverine from the trap, make sure it's really dead." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.name: Hallowed Ground
item.text: {W}{W}: Return target nonsnow land you control to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: "On this site where Kjeld's blood was spilled, let none raise a fist or deny a beggar." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.name: Halls of Mist
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Creatures that attacked during their controller's last turn can't attack.

item.name: Heal
item.text:
Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "Sometimes even the smallest boon can save a life." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.name: Hecatomb
item.text: When Hecatomb enters the battlefield, sacrifice Hecatomb unless you sacrifice four creatures. Tap an untapped Swamp you control: Hecatomb deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Hematite Talisman
item.text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, untap target permanent.

item.name: Hipparion
item.text: Hipparion can't block creatures with power 3 or greater unless you pay {1}.
item.flavorText: "Someone once said that Hipparions are to Warriors what Aesthir are to Skyknights. Don't believe it." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

item.name: Hoar Shade
item.text: {B}: Hoar Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The creature we fought in the western waste was doubly dangerous: mortally wounded, it rebounded and attacked again." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Hot Springs
item.text: Enchant land you control Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn."
item.flavorText: Warmth is life; heat is peace.

item.name: Howl from Beyond
item.text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "From the mouths of my servants, my voice shall emerge to shake the souls of my foes." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.name: Hurricane
item.text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.
item.flavorText: "This was quite possibly the least pleasant occurrence on the entire expedition." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Hyalopterous Lemure
item.text: {0}: Hyalopterous Lemure gets -1/-0 and gains flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The Lemures looked harmless, until they descended on my troops. Within moments, only bones remained." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

item.name: Hydroblast
item.text: Choose one — Counter target spell if it's red; or destroy target permanent if it's red.
item.flavorText: "Heed the lessons of our time: the forms of water may move the land itself and hold captive the fires within." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

item.name: Hymn of Rebirth
item.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
item.flavorText: "There will come soft rains, and spring shall be amongst us, a welcome friend." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.name: Ice Cauldron
item.text: {X}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Ice Cauldron and exile a nonland card from your hand. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled. Note the type and amount of mana spent to pay this activation cost. Activate this ability only if there are no charge counters on Ice Cauldron. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Ice Cauldron: Add Ice Cauldron's last noted type and amount of mana to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast the last card exiled with Ice Cauldron.

item.name: Ice Floe
item.text: You may choose not to untap Ice Floe during your untap step. {T}: Tap target creature without flying that's attacking you. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Ice Floe remains tapped.

item.name: Iceberg
item.text: Iceberg enters the battlefield with X ice counters on it. {3}: Put an ice counter on Iceberg. Remove an ice counter from Iceberg: Add {1} to your mana pool.

item.name: Icequake
item.text: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, Icequake deals 1 damage to that land's controller.
item.flavorText: "When the earth shakes, and their animals are swallowed up by the ground, perhaps they will think twice before attacking again." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.name: Icy Manipulator
item.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
item.flavorText: "The scavengers who first found it called it the ‘Bone Crank.' Not a bad name, I'd say." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Icy Prison
item.text: When Icy Prison enters the battlefield, exile target creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Icy Prison unless any player pays {3}. When Icy Prison leaves the battlefield, return the exiled creature to the battlefield under its owner's control.

item.name: Illusionary Forces
item.text: Flying Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
item.flavorText: "This school was founded in secret, operates in secret, and exists for the teaching of secrets. Those who would alter reality must first escape it." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

item.name: Illusionary Presence
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a land type. Illusionary Presence gains landwalk of the chosen type until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "We could feel the Shaman's power, as surely as we felt the storm." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Illusionary Terrain
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) As Illusionary Terrain enters the battlefield, choose two basic land types. Basic lands of the first chosen type are the second chosen type.
item.flavorText: "The drawing of maps is fruitless in the west near the ice walls; the very earth is formless." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Illusionary Wall
item.text: Defender, flying, first strike Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
item.flavorText: "Let them see what is not there and feel what does not touch them. When they no longer trust their senses, that is the time to strike." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

item.name: Illusions of Grandeur
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Illusions of Grandeur enters the battlefield, you gain 20 life. When Illusions of Grandeur leaves the battlefield, you lose 20 life.

item.name: Imposing Visage
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
item.flavorText: "I can't believe they expect me to fight with this rabble. A Goblin in a big mask sends ‘em running for cover." —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

item.name: Incinerate
item.text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
item.flavorText: "Yes, I think ‘toast' is an appropriate description." —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

item.name: Infernal Darkness
item.text: Cumulative upkeep—Pay {B} and 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) If a land is tapped for mana, it produces {B} instead of any other type.
item.flavorText: "I thought the day had brought enough horrors for our ragged band, but the night was far worse." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

item.name: Infernal Denizen
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice two Swamps. If you can't, tap Infernal Denizen, and an opponent may gain control of a creature you control of his or her choice for as long as Infernal Denizen remains on the battlefield. {T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as Infernal Denizen remains on the battlefield.

item.name: Infinite Hourglass
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on Infinite Hourglass. All creatures get +1/+0 for each time counter on Infinite Hourglass. {3}: Remove a time counter from Infinite Hourglass. Any player may activate this ability but only during any upkeep step.

item.name: Infuse
item.text:
Untap target artifact, creature, or land.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "The potential for change lies in all things. Know a thing's nature, know its possibilities, and know it anew." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Jester's Cap
item.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Search target player's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
item.flavorText: "Know your foes' strengths as well as their weaknesses." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Jester's Mask
item.text: Jester's Mask enters the battlefield tapped. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Mask: Target opponent puts the cards from his or her hand on top of his or her library. Search that player's library for that many cards. That player puts those cards into his or her hand, then shuffles his or her library.

item.name: Jeweled Amulet
item.text: {1}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Jeweled Amulet. Note the type of mana spent to pay this activation cost. Activate this ability only if there are no charge counters on Jeweled Amulet. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Jeweled Amulet: Add one mana of Jeweled Amulet's last noted type to your mana pool.

item.name: Johtull Wurm
item.text: Whenever Johtull Wurm becomes blocked, it gets -2/-1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.
item.flavorText: "To bring her down we must be on all sides at once—leave one avenue open and we'll all be dead." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

item.name: Jokulhaups
item.text: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "I was shocked when I first saw the aftermath of the Yavimaya Valley disaster. The raging waters had swept away trees, bridges, and even houses. My healers had much work to do." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.name: Juniper Order Druid
item.text: {T}: Untap target land.
item.flavorText: "The filthy towns of Kjeldor are no place for anyone to live. Fyndhorn is our home now." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

item.name: Justice
item.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Justice unless you pay {W}{W}.
Whenever a red creature or spell deals damage, Justice deals that much damage to that creature's or spell's controller.

item.name: Karplusan Forest
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Karplusan Giant
item.text: Tap an untapped snow land you control: Karplusan Giant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "They aren't the brightest or the quickest of Giants. For that matter, the same holds true if you compare them to rocks." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Karplusan Yeti
item.text: {T}: Karplusan Yeti deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Karplusan Yeti.
item.flavorText: "What's that smell?" —Perena Deepcutter, Dwarven Armorer

item.name: Kelsinko Ranger
item.text: {1}{W}: Target green creature gains first strike until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Rangers not trained by the Elves just aren't the same." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

item.name: Kjeldoran Dead
item.text: When Kjeldoran Dead enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature. {B}: Regenerate Kjeldoran Dead.
item.flavorText: "They shall kill those whom once they loved." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.name: Kjeldoran Elite Guard
item.text: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Kjeldoran Elite Guard. Activate this ability only during combat.
item.flavorText: The winged helms of the Guard are put on for pageants—but taken off for war.

item.name: Kjeldoran Frostbeast
item.text: At end of combat, destroy all creatures blocking or blocked by Kjeldoran Frostbeast.
item.flavorText: "Two of my Warriors found that the creature was dangerous not only in combat, but also in simple proximity." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Kjeldoran Guard
item.text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Kjeldoran Guard. Activate this ability only during combat and only if defending player controls no snow lands.

item.name: Kjeldoran Knight
item.text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.) {1}{W}: Kjeldoran Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {W}{W}: Kjeldoran Knight gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Those who do not ride the wind on Aesthir still command loyalty and respect." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

item.name: Kjeldoran Phalanx
item.text: First strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
item.flavorText: "There's nothing I like better than watching a street full of soldiers kicking down the doors of the guilty and the impure." —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

item.name: Kjeldoran Royal Guard
item.text: {T}: All combat damage that would be dealt to you by unblocked creatures this turn is dealt to Kjeldoran Royal Guard instead.
item.flavorText: "Honorable in battle, generous in death." —Motto of the Kjeldoran Royal Guard

item.name: Kjeldoran Skycaptain
item.text: Flying; first strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
item.flavorText: "If we do our duty and uphold our honor, Kjeldor shall stand for a thousand years." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

item.name: Kjeldoran Skyknight
item.text: Flying; first strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
item.flavorText: "My Aesthir is my most trusted ally. We fight as one and live as one, and we will die as one." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

item.name: Kjeldoran Warrior
item.text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
item.flavorText: "Give me a thousand such Warriors and I could change the world." —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

item.name: Knight of Stromgald
item.text: Protection from white {B}: Knight of Stromgald gains first strike until end of turn. {B}{B}: Knight of Stromgald gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Kjeldorans should rule supreme, and to the rest, death" —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

item.name: Krovikan Elementalist
item.text: {2}{R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {U}{U}: Target creature you control gains flying until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
item.flavorText: "The Elementalists' talents could be useful if turned to other purposes." —Zur the Enchanter

item.name: Krovikan Fetish
item.text: Enchant creature When Krovikan Fetish enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
item.flavorText: Some Krovikans find strength in the ears and eyes of their victims and wear such fetishes into battle.

item.name: Krovikan Sorcerer
item.text: {T}, Discard a nonblack card: Draw a card. {T}, Discard a black card: Draw two cards, then discard one of them.
item.flavorText: "These Sorcerers always seem to have another surprise up their sleeves." —Zur the Enchanter

item.name: Krovikan Vampire
item.text: At the beginning of each end step, if a creature dealt damage by Krovikan Vampire this turn was put into a graveyard, put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Sacrifice it when you lose control of Krovikan Vampire.

item.name: Land Cap
item.text: Land Cap doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a depletion counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a depletion counter from Land Cap. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. Put a depletion counter on Land Cap.

item.name: Lapis Lazuli Talisman
item.text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, untap target permanent.

item.name: Lava Burst
item.text: Lava Burst deals X damage to target creature or player. If Lava Burst would deal damage to a creature, that damage can't be prevented or dealt instead to another creature or player.
item.flavorText: "Overkill? This isn't a game of Kick-the-Ouphe" —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

item.name: Lava Tubes

item.name: Legions of Lim-Dûl
item.text: Snow swampwalk
item.flavorText: "I have seen the faces of my dead friends among that grim band, and I can bear no more." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield.

item.name: Leshrac's Rite
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has swampwalk.
item.flavorText: "Bind me to thee, my soul to thine. I am your servant and your slave. I shall hunger for your word and thirst for your blessing. Blood for blood, flesh for flesh, Leshrac, my lord." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.name: Leshrac's Sigil
item.text: Whenever an opponent casts a green spell, you may pay {B}{B}. If you do, look at that player's hand and choose a card from it. The player discards that card. {B}{B}: Return Leshrac's Sigil to its owner's hand.

item.name: Lhurgoyf

item.flavorText: "Ach Hans, run It's the Lhurgoyf" —Saffi Eriksdotter, last words

item.name: Lightning Blow
item.text:
Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "If you do it right, they'll never know what hit them." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

item.name: Lim-Dûl's Cohort
item.text: Whenever Lim-Dûl's Cohort blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature can't be regenerated this turn.
item.flavorText: "Join me in the place of power, you risen dead. Join me where the waters weep and the trees have no hearts." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, for each player, Lim-Dûl's Hex deals 1 damage to that player unless he or she pays {B} or {3}.
item.flavorText: "The weak shall fall. The strong shall remain." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.text: As Lost Order of Jarkeld enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Lost Order of Jarkeld's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of creatures the chosen player controls.
item.flavorText: "Let us remember brave Jarkeld and his troops, who perished in the Adarkar Wastes so long ago." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Maddening Wind deals 2 damage to that player.
item.flavorText: "It is Freyalise, walking on the world." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

Whenever Márton Stromgald blocks, other blocking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn for each blocking creature other than Márton Stromgald.

item.flavorText: "Magic overused can freeze the mind. Creativity is more important than power." —Zur the Enchanter

item.flavorText: "Eenie, meenie, minie, moe . . . oh, why not all of them?" —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

item.flavorText: An end to reason, an end to order. Forget all that has been.

item.text: Look at target player's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards those cards.

item.flavorText: "A mind in agony is a sparrow without wings."Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.flavorText: "A minion given over to Tevesh Szat is a stronger minion gained." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.flavorText: "Although my official log will state there is no evidence pointing to the existence of the Mistfolk, my certainty is lessened by the cursed consistency of the expedition's eyewitness accounts." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.flavorText: "No one in her right mind would venture off the coast of Kjeldor during this season." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Moor Fiend
item.text: Swampwalk
item.flavorText: "Let them close the gates of Krov from dusk until dawn if they so choose. It matters not. My fiends shall yet rend their flesh from their bones." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, untap target permanent.

item.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, untap target permanent.

item.text: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.

item.text: Cumulative upkeep {1}{U}{U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) If tapped for mana, Plains produce {R}, Swamps produce {G}, Mountains produce {W}, and Forests produce {B} instead of any other type.
item.flavorText: "Nothing is as it seems." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by red creatures. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a red permanent.

(The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
item.flavorText: "Faith in Freyalise has given me the gift, not the curse, of unprecedented longevity." —Laina of the Elvish Council

item.text: Snow forestwalk
item.flavorText: "The Dryads told us to stay, as no new horrors would come when it was so cold. Three of us left anyway. The rest believed their lies, and their skeletons weren't found until the thaw." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Ritual of Subdual
item.text: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) If a land is tapped for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of any other type.
item.flavorText: "That which does not bend to the will of Freyalise shall surely break." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

item.name: Runed Arch
item.text: Runed Arch enters the battlefield tapped. {X}, {T}, Sacrifice Runed Arch: X target creatures with power 2 or less are unblockable this turn.

item.name: Sabretooth Tiger
item.text: First strike
item.flavorText: "Daughter, it is now your turn to hunt the Tiger, and make a blanket of its fur." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, put a +0/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.
item.flavorText: "Divine gifts are granted to those who are worthy." —Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

item.name: Scaled Wurm
item.flavorText: "Flourishing during the Ice Age, these Wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares—they embodied the worst of the Ice Age." —Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

item.name: Sea Spirit
item.text: {U}: Sea Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "It rose above our heads, above the ship, and still higher yet. No foggy, ice-laden sea in the world could frighten me more." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

item.name: Seizures

item.flavorText: "Sheathe your sword, warrior, lest ye fall on it when stricken." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.name: Seraph

item.name: Shambling Strider
item.text: {R}{G}: Shambling Strider gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Freyalise forbid that any stranger should wander into the Striders' territory.

item.name: Shatter
item.text: Destroy target artifact.
item.flavorText: "Let the past be the past. Do not call up that which you cannot put down. Destroy that which destroyed us, so long ago." —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

item.name: Shield Bearer
item.text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
item.flavorText: "You have almost completed your four years, my son. Soon you shall be a Skyknight." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

item.name: Shield of the Ages
item.text: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
item.flavorText: "This shield is a true rarity: an artifact whose purpose is obvious." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Shyft
item.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have Shyft become the color or colors of your choice. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
item.flavorText: "Capturing this specimen was not easy. Study it well, that you someday might be as versatile." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

item.name: Sibilant Spirit
item.text: Flying Whenever Sibilant Spirit attacks, defending player may draw a card.
item.flavorText: "Relax. I'm sure it's just a snake hissing." —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

item.name: Silver Erne
item.text: Flying, trample
item.flavorText: "I've seen a larger Erne knock a Giant to the ground and stay airborne. They move not with the wind, but as the wind." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

item.name: Skeleton Ship

item.flavorText: "The sea gives up her dead as easily as the soil." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.flavorText: "Let any who doubt the evil of using the ancient devices look at this infernal machine. What manner of fiend would design such a sadistic device?" —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

item.flavorText: "Give me wings to fly and speed to strike. In return, the glory I earn shall be yours."Steinar Icefist, Balduvian Shaman

item.flavorText: "If you're starving, eat your horses, your dead, or yourself—but never eat your dog." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox
