item.flavorText: "There's more than one way to skin an Ouphe—or thwart a mage." —Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

item.name: Soul Burn
item.text: Spend only black and/or red mana on X. Soul Burn deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before Soul Burn dealt damage, or the creature's toughness.

item.name: Soul Kiss
item.text: Enchant creature {B}, Pay 1 life: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than three times each turn.

item.name: Spectral Shield
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and can't be the target of spells.
item.flavorText: "What can be a stronger shield than concealment? Have you ever defeated an enemy you didn't know existed?" —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

item.name: Spoils of Evil
item.text: For each artifact or creature card in target opponent's graveyard, add {1} to your mana pool and you gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: "Virtue has its rewards, as does its opposite." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.name: Spoils of War
item.text: X is the number of artifact and/or creature cards in an opponent's graveyard as you cast Spoils of War. Distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures.
item.flavorText: "This is the fun part" —Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician

item.name: Staff of the Ages
item.text: Creatures with landwalk abilities can be blocked as though they didn't have those abilities.
item.flavorText: "We found this staff useful on our visit to this very commission. Would Relicbane prefer we had been slain by Lim-Dûl's horrors?" —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Stampede
item.text: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "We could see the horizon blacken with the great beasts, but it was too late. The icefield offered no immediate safety, but luckily most of us reached a crevasse in which we could take cover." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Stench of Evil
item.text: Destroy all Plains. For each land put into a graveyard this way, Stench of Evil deals 1 damage to that land's controller unless he or she pays {2}.

item.name: Stone Rain
item.text: Destroy target land.
item.flavorText: "May the forces that took Argoth beneath the waves never come among us again." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Stone Spirit
item.text: Stone Spirit can't be blocked by creatures with flying.
item.flavorText: "The spirit of the stone is the spirit of strength." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.name: Stonehands
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Trust in the power of stone. Stone is strong; stone shatters swords; stone breaks bones. Trust in stone." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.name: Storm Spirit
item.text: Flying {T}: Storm Spirit deals 2 damage to target creature.
item.flavorText: "Come to us, with your lightning. Come to us, with your thunder. Serve us with your strength, and smite our foes with your power." —Steinar Icefist, Balduvian Shaman

item.name: Stormbind
item.text: {2}, Discard a card at random: Stormbind deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "Once, our people could call down the storm itself to do our bidding." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.name: Stromgald Cabal
item.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Counter target white spell.
item.flavorText: "Kjeldor must be supreme at any cost." —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

item.name: Stunted Growth
item.text: Target player chooses three cards from his or her hand and puts them on top of his or her library in any order.

item.name: Sulfurous Springs
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Sunstone
item.text: {2}, Sacrifice a snow land: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
item.flavorText: "I dispute Relicbane's hysterical allegations, Commissioner, but it is true that these artifacts can be dangerous." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swords to Plowshares
item.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
item.flavorText: "The so-called Barbarians will not respect us for our military might—they will respect us for our honor." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

item.name: Tarpan
item.text: When Tarpan is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: "A good Tarpan will serve you, faithful and true. A bad one will kick you in the head." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

item.name: Thermokarst
item.text: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, you gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: "Finally we understand the lesson of our home: loss begets renewal." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

item.name: Thoughtleech
item.text: Whenever an Island an opponent controls becomes tapped, you may gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: "A resourceful mage has many sources of information. The best one is your foe." —Zur the Enchanter

item.name: Thunder Wall
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying {U}: Thunder Wall gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "The Lemures had barely taken wing when the sky roared with thunder. The swarm of little beasts wavered, divided, and fell, crashing to the earth." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

item.name: Timberline Ridge
item.text: Timberline Ridge doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a depletion counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a depletion counter from Timberline Ridge. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Put a depletion counter on Timberline Ridge.

item.name: Time Bomb
item.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on Time Bomb.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Time Bomb: Time Bomb deals damage to each creature and each player equal to the number of time counters on Time Bomb.

item.name: Tinder Wall
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Sacrifice Tinder Wall: Add {R}{R} to your mana pool. {R}, Sacrifice Tinder Wall: Tinder Wall deals 2 damage to target creature it's blocking.

item.name: Tor Giant
item.flavorText: "What do you do then? Run. Run very fast. Don't stop until you see the camp—or a bigger Giant." —Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

item.name: Total War
item.text: Whenever a player attacks with one or more creatures, destroy all untapped non-Wall creatures that player controls that didn't attack, except for creatures the player hasn't controlled continuously since the beginning of the turn.

item.name: Touch of Death
item.text:
Touch of Death deals 1 damage to target player. You gain 1 life.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "What was yours is mine. Your land, your people, and now your life." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

item.name: Touch of Vitae
item.text: Until end of turn, target creature gains haste and "{0}: Untap this creature. Activate this ability only once." Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

item.name: Trailblazer
item.text: Target creature is unblockable this turn.
item.flavorText: "Our Elvish Hunter Taaveti led us swiftly along hidden paths through the dense forest. We caught the Orcs from behind, and completely by surprise." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

item.name: Underground River
item.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Underground River deals 1 damage to you.

item.name: Updraft
item.text:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
item.flavorText: "The power of flight has but one equal in battle: surprise. Understanding how to use both is the key to victory." —Arnjlot Olasson, Sky Mage

item.name: Urza's Bauble
item.text: {T}, Sacrifice Urza's Bauble: Look at a card at random in target player's hand. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

item.name: Veldt
item.text: Veldt doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a depletion counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a depletion counter from Veldt. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Put a depletion counter on Veldt.

item.name: Venomous Breath
item.text: At end of combat, destroy all creatures that blocked or were blocked by target creature this turn.

item.name: Vertigo
item.text: Vertigo deals 2 damage to target creature with flying. That creature loses flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "I saw the wizard gesturing, but I didn't guess his plan until my Aesthir cried out and went into a dive." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

item.name: Vexing Arcanix
item.text: {3}, {T}: Target player names a card, then reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's the named card, the player puts it into his or her hand. Otherwise, the player puts it into his or her graveyard and Vexing Arcanix deals 2 damage to him or her.

item.name: Vibrating Sphere
item.text: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +2/+0. As long as it's not your turn, creatures you control get -0/-2.
item.flavorText: "Unearthly and invisible fibers emanate from this sphere, entangling all who draw near." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Walking Wall
item.text: Defender {3}: Walking Wall gets +3/-1 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Activate this ability only once each turn.
item.flavorText: "The fortress is not what it seems." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Wall of Lava
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {R}: Wall of Lava gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Now there's something you don't see every day." —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

item.name: Wall of Pine Needles
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {G}: Regenerate Wall of Pine Needles.
item.flavorText: The power of the forest takes a hundred forms. Some are more surprising than others.

item.name: Wall of Shields
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Banding (If any creatures with banding you control are blocking a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by.)
item.flavorText: "It's the pokey bits that hurt the most." —Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician

item.name: War Chariot
item.text: {3}, {T}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "I wouldn't advise using it with a Woolly Mammoth, but it's quite appropriate for many other beasts." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: Warning
item.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.
item.flavorText: "The folk of the Karplusan Mountains are impossible to ambush." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

item.name: Whalebone Glider
item.text: {2}, {T}: Target creature with power 3 or less gains flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "It's no Ornithopter, but then I'm no Urza." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

item.name: White Scarab
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by white creatures. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a white permanent.

item.name: Whiteout
item.text: All creatures lose flying until end of turn. Sacrifice a snow land: Return Whiteout from your graveyard to your hand.

item.name: Wiitigo
item.text: Wiitigo enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Wiitigo if it has blocked or been blocked since your last upkeep. Otherwise, remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

item.name: Wild Growth
item.text: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G} to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
item.flavorText: "Here in Fyndhorn, where Freyalise's power is strongest, the forest has its own opinion." —Laina of the Elvish Council

item.name: Wind Spirit
item.text: Flying Wind Spirit can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
item.flavorText: "To visit the sky requires bravery, and thought, and little else. To master the sky requires the binding of its masters, and little else." —Arnjlot Olasson, Sky Mage

item.name: Wings of Aesthir
item.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has flying and first strike.
item.flavorText: "For those of courage, even the sky holds no limit." —Arnjlot Olasson, Sky Mage

item.name: Winter's Chill
item.text: Cast Winter's Chill only during combat before blockers are declared. X can't be greater than the number of snow lands you control. Destroy X target attacking creatures at end of combat. For each attacking creature, its controller may pay {1} or {2} to prevent this effect. If that player pays only {1} for that creature, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

item.name: Withering Wisps
item.text: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Withering Wisps. {B}: Withering Wisps deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. Activate this ability no more times each turn than the number of snow Swamps you control.

item.name: Woolly Mammoths
item.text: Woolly Mammoths has trample as long as you control a snow land.
item.flavorText: "Mammoths may be good to ride on, but they're certainly bad to fall off of" —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Woolly Spider
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "We need not fear the forces of the air; I've yet to see a Spider without an appetite." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

item.name: Word of Blasting
item.text: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated. Word of Blasting deals damage equal to that Wall's converted mana cost to the Wall's controller.
item.flavorText: "Walls? What walls?" —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

item.name: Word of Undoing
item.text: Return target creature and all white Auras you own attached to it to their owners' hands.
item.flavorText: "It was in Urza's journals that I finally found the secret at the core of the summonings." —Journal, author unknown

item.name: Wrath of Marit Lage
item.text: When Wrath of Marit Lage enters the battlefield, tap all red creatures. Red creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
item.flavorText: Dread Marit Lage lies dreaming, not dead.

item.name: Yavimaya Gnats
item.text: Flying {G}: Regenerate Yavimaya Gnats.
item.flavorText: "It is our third day of travel on the Yavimaya River, and still these creatures plague us. Davin Lansson, our naturalist, has facetiously labeled them ‘gnats,' and the name has stuck." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

item.name: Zuran Enchanter
item.text: {2}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn.
item.flavorText: "We are Kjeldorans no more." —Zur the Enchanter

item.name: Zuran Orb
item.text: Sacrifice a land: You gain 2 life.
item.flavorText: "I will go to any length to achieve my goal. Eternal life is worth any sacrifice." —Zur the Enchanter

item.name: Zuran Spellcaster
item.text: {T}: Zuran Spellcaster deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: "A mage must be precise as well as potent; cautious, as well as clever." —Zur the Enchanter

item.name: Zur's Weirding
item.text: Players play with their hands revealed. If a player would draw a card, he or she reveals it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.
